TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlMeta extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML tag on the server.

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML tag on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的 html 提供以编程方式访问``服务器上的元素。The control provides programmatic access to the HTML `` element on the server. HTML``元素是一个容器有关数据呈现页上，但不是页内容本身。The HTML `` element is a container for data about the rendered page, but not page content itself. ``标签将被放置之间的开始和结束 HTML``元素。The `` tag is placed between the opening and closing HTML `` elements. 每个``元素描述元数据属性名称及其关联的值。Each `` element describes a metadata property name and its associated value. 使用控件的属性来指定元数据属性名称，与属性指定的元数据属性值。Use the control's property to specify the metadata property name, and the property to specify the metadata property value. 使用属性以指定如何解释的元数据属性的用户代理的附加信息。Use the property to specify additional information to user agents on how to interpret the metadata property. 使用属性代替属性时将使用 HTTP 检索最终生成的元数据属性。Use the property in place of the property when the resulting metadata property will be retrieved using HTTP. 你可以对页的引用``元素使用属性对象。You can get a reference to the page `` element using the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中以定义 HTML``网页上的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 两个``元素的定义，则列出描述页上，另一个列出的日期关键字创建页。Two `` elements are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控件。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"元"文字字符串。The "meta" literal string.| ## Examples 有关如何使用的示例构造函数，请参阅类概述主题。For an example of how to use the constructor, see the class overview topic.

.property instance string Content
Public Overridable Property Content As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Content { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the metadata property value defined by the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the metadata property value defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一起使用属性，定义页的元数据属性。The property, together with the property, defines a metadata property of the page. 属性呈现给`content`属性生成的 HTML``元素。The property is rendered to the `content` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中以定义 HTML``网页上的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 两个``元素的定义，则列出描述页上，另一个列出的日期关键字创建页。Two `` elements are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 属性用于定义`content`每个属性``标记。The property is used to define the `content` attribute for each `` tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets an control property that is included in the HTTP response header.

span.span: Gets or sets an control property that is included in the HTTP response header.

value.span: HTTP 响应标头项的名称。

span.span: The name of the HTTP response header item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性代替属性来标识应包含在 HTTP 请求的响应标头的信息。Use the property in place of the property to identify information that should be included in the response headers of an HTTP request. 属性呈现给`http-equiv`属性生成的 HTML``元素。The property is rendered to the `http-equiv` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一起使用属性，定义页的元数据属性。The property, together with the property, defines a metadata property of the page. 属性呈现给`name`属性生成的 HTML``元素。The property is rendered to the `name` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中以定义 HTML``网页上的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 两个``定义的标记，则列出描述页上，另一个列出的日期关键字创建页。Two `` tags are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 属性用于定义`name`每个属性``标记。The property is used to define the `name` attribute of each `` tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: writer
param.span: The used to render the control's content on the client's browser.

summary.span: Renders the control to the client's browser using the specified object.

span.span: Renders the control to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件呈现HTML 大括号 (/ >) 上``客户端的浏览器是否符合 XHTML 的元素。The control renders a HTML bracket (/>) on the `` element if the client's browser is XHTML compliant. 为非 XHTML 呈现配置 ASP.NET 的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 配置 XHTML 呈现在 ASP.NET 网站](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)。For more information on configuring ASP.NET for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).

para.span: 在扩展控制，请重写方法以提供自定义的呈现。

span.span: When extending the control, override the method to provide custom rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Scheme { get; set; }
.property instance string Scheme
Public Overridable Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a attribute used to interpret the metadata property value defined by the control.

span.span: Gets or sets a attribute used to interpret the metadata property value defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定`scheme`呈现的 HTML 特性``元素。The property allows you to specify a `scheme` attribute of the rendered HTML `` element. `scheme`属性可用来提供用户代理，如客户端浏览器或搜索引擎，解释的元数据属性的附加上下文。The `scheme` attribute can be used to provide user agents, such as client browsers or search engines, additional context for interpreting the metadata property. 属性呈现给`scheme`属性生成的 HTML``元素。The property is rendered to the `scheme` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中以定义 HTML``网页上的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 两个``定义的标记，则列出描述页上，另一个列出的日期关键字创建页。Two `` tags are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 属性用于日期相关``标记以帮助用户代理读取日期值。The property is used for the date-related `` tag to aid user agents reading the date value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
